remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性为对象中的按钮标题提供自定义的显示格式 。Use the property to provide a custom display format for the caption of the buttons in the object. 数据格式字符串由以冒号分隔的两部分组成，其形式为 `{A:Bxx}` 。The data format string consists of two parts, separated by a colon, in the form `{A:Bxx}`. 例如，格式化字符串设置 `{0:F2}` 单元格的格式以显示具有两个小数位的固定的点号。For example, the formatting string `{0:F2}` formats the cell to display a fixed point number with two decimal places. > [!NOTE] > 整个字符串必须括在大括号中，以指示它是格式字符串而不是文本字符串。The entire string must be enclosed in braces to indicate that it is a format string and not a literal string. 大括号外的任何文本都显示为文本。Any text outside the braces is displayed as literal text. 常规示例中冒号 (前面的值 `A`) 在从零开始的参数列表中指定参数索引。The value before the colon (`A` in the general example) specifies the parameter index in a zero-based list of parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此值只能设置为0，因为每个单元格中只有一个值。This value can be set only to 0 because there is only one value in each cell. 常规示例中冒号后面的字符 (`B`) 指定显示值的格式。The character after the colon (`B` in the general example) specifies the format to display the value in. 下表列出了常见格式。The following table lists the common formats. |格式字符Format character|显示数值Displays numeric values in| |----------------------|--------------------------------| |`C`|货币格式。Currency format.| |`D`|小数格式。Decimal format.| |`E`|科学 (指数) 格式。Scientific (exponential) format.| |`F`|固定格式。Fixed format.| |`G`|常规格式。General format.| |`N`|数字格式。Number format.| |`X`|十六进制格式。Hexadecimal format.| > [!NOTE] > 格式字符不区分大小写，但除外 `X` ，后者在指定的情况下显示十六进制字符。The format character is not case sensitive, except for `X`, which displays the hexadecimal characters in the case specified. 常规示例中格式字符 (后面的值 `xx`) 指定要显示的有效位数或小数位数。The value after the format character (`xx` in the general example) specifies the number of significant digits or decimal places to display. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 有关设置字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式设置类型](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information on formatting strings, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性以货币格式显示对象中每个按钮的标题 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the caption of each button in the object in currency format. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性指定 当对象回发到服务器时对其引发验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the object causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当属性的值设置为时，属性才有效果 `true` 。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为属性指定值，则 当 回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the posts back to the server. 如果没有为属性指定值， 并且 属性设置为 `true` ，则当 回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for the property and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the posts back to the server. 此属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of this property is stored in view state.
